product_name: Keen Hydro Guide Sandals - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With sticky outsoles and beefy toe bumpers, the Keen Hydro Guide sandals offer stability and protection on adventures that take you in and out of the water. Adjustable polyester webbing straps deliver a snug, secure fit; water-resistant mesh lining keeps sandals from feeling waterlogged. Draining midsoles and outsoles ensure sandals shed water to keep your feet feeling light; EVA midsoles provide comfortable cushioning and support. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment deters odor development. Patented toe bumpers shield toes from rocks and debris. Durable rubber outsoles deliver reliable traction on wet or uneven terrain. Closeout.
short_description: With sticky outsoles and beefy toe bumpers, the Keen Hydro Guide sandals offer stability and protection on adventures that take you in and out of the water.
